channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Marathon Event In ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Ends With The Next Patch
item.description: If you still haven’t completed the Marathon event in Escape From Tarkov you may want to hurry up, as the next patch will bring it to an end.

item.title: Empathy at a distance

item.title: Jorge Masvidal Says He Is Returning To UFC, Drops A Brilliant Callout

item.title: Compared to perfect
item.description: Perfect is useful. It’s an absolute measure, a north star, a chance to improve our work. But it’s also a shortcut to persistent dissatisfaction. Compa...

item.title: OnlyFans Billionaire Owner Pockets $472 Million Dividend
item.description: A marked increase in non-subscription revenue resulted in a fat payout for the platform’s sole owner Leonid Radvinsky.

item.title: Practical approaches for more effective teamwork

item.title: Samsung Ends Updates For Several Galaxy Devices, Upgrade Now
item.description: Samsung is dropping security support for some big Galaxy phones this month.
